verbs.description: [ARG0: Cindy McCain and Meghan McCain , the wife and daughter of Sen. John McCain ,] [V: shot] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARGM-DIR: at President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARGM-CAU: for attacking McCain at CPAC] .
Cindy McCain and Meghan McCain , the wife and daughter of Sen. John McCain , shot back at [ARG0: President Trump] Wednesday for [V: attacking] [ARG1: McCain] [ARGM-LOC: at CPAC] .
